subject: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New York.
#455 Broadway New York, NY, 10227 USA.
New Year Bonanza Bonanza Bonanza
Dear Customer: Chase Bank HeadQuarter is now offering New Year Bonanza to all our customers who have not receive his/her funds in our bank, you are not going to pay $50 again, 
the fee has been redeuce to only $25 to help you receive your funds 
$2.5 Million USD to ATM card now, 
send the fee $25 through Apple card/ Bitcoin or Steam wallet card, again there is no more time to delay again, you have only 24/48 hours to send the fee $25 gift card, and receive your ATM card.
Reconfirm your full details.
Your  Full Name:
Your Home Address:
Your Phone Number:
Your WhatsApp Number:
Your Occupation:
Your Country:
Your copy ID
:
Your Age:
The fee we needed is $25.00 USD send the fee by Steam Wallet Card / Apple iTunes Gift Card or Bitcoin.
I wait for the picture of the gift card.
Thank You For Banking With Us.
Mr. Robert Justin
CEO Manager Chase Bank

subject: Re: From: JP Morgan Chase Bank New
body:
Hello Mr. Robert Justin,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting opportunity. I must say, a New Year Bonanza sounds quite intriguing! I appreciate you taking the time to inform me about the reduced fee for receiving my funds.

Before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about how this process works? Specifically, I would like to know how the ATM card will be delivered to me and what steps I need to take once I receive it. Additionally, could you clarify why the fee needs to be paid through Apple card Bitcoin or Steam wallet card?

I look forward to your response and thank you again for considering me for this opportunity.

Best wishes,
Heather
